skill.name: set_velocity
skill.description: Set the velocity of the mobile robot in the forward direction.

states.name: starting
states.action: Prepare the system to begin setting the velocity of the robot.

states.name: execute
states.action: Set the velocity of the robot to the desired value if it does not exceed the maximum possible velocity.

states.name: completing
states.action: Print the current velocity of the robot.

states.name: stopping
states.action: Set the velocity of the robot to zero.

states.name: resetting
states.action: Shut down processes used to set the robot's velocity.
